Reviews.Title: HOLY COW so much better than a gopro
Reviews.Author: Eric "Nothing rustles jimmies more than an ho...
Reviews.Content: Yes it's heavier..but it's easier to use by no less than ten billion percent.  Seriously.  I returned a hero3+ and got this and it's so much better to actually live with..

Reviews.Title: extremely heavy
Reviews.Author: paloosh
Reviews.Content: The product is very bulky and makes makes many action sports uncomfortable to do . because of its size and weight I can not even use it properly the functions keys are also very difficult to operate. This is a cheap go pro imitation that is bulky and clumsy !

Reviews.Title: Not even close to a go pro
Reviews.Author: ethan jazz
Reviews.Content: The product attempts to be an action cam but it does not compare to the go pro hero 3 . It feels clumsy and it is difficult to handleI would not recommend this to anyone. the entry level go pro piece will be a much better buy.
